about.title: About
about.subTitle: About Me
about.text1: Hi! I'm Aldy. I started learning web development at the beginning of the pandemic. With not much else to do, I decided to begin my web development journey through web development forums. After that, I started watching various YouTube videos to delve deeper into web development, especially in terms of frontend development.
about.text2: I'm eager to expand my knowledge and skills in frontend development, as there is a vast array of technologies and concepts to explore. I find great satisfaction in the process of acquiring new information and techniques, and I'm highly motivated to keep learning and growing. I value constructive feedback as it helps me refine my abilities and enhance my overall proficiency.
about.text3: Through this website, I plan to share my thoughts and showcase the projects I've worked on. I firmly believe that documenting what I've learned is an excellent method to solidify my understanding, and it also allows me to impart my knowledge with others. Please don't hesitate to reach out, and I'll be delighted to assist you!

home.subTitle: Introduction and Professional Career Journey.
home.bio:
Working within Vue Js & Laravel, transform ideas into digital realities that are
easily accessible and inclusive for web users.

projects.description1: TO DO project for the Super Bootcamp Sanbercode 2024 assignment.
projects.description2: Back End application for a Restful API themed Review Film. It provides services for application display movie reviews.
projects.description3: This project is a task from the Sanbercode Bootcamp. It functions to display movie reviews.
projects.description4: My Fullstack project about a library online with web portal user and admin dashboard. I have dashboard admin for 3 activities. The user can borrow and sell books. The admin can manage the library activities and monitor the library performance.

frontend.item1: HTML & CSS: Crafting responsive, user-friendly web pages with modern, semantic markup.
frontend.item2: JavaScript & TypeScript: Building dynamic and interactive user interfaces.
frontend.item3: Frameworks: Proficient in Vue.js for creating efficient, maintainable, and scalable web applications.

backend.item1: Laravel: Developing fast and scalable server-side applications.
backend.item2: Database Management: Skilled in SQL databases like MySQL.

design.title: Design
design.item1: Bootstrap: Utilizing Bootstrap for creating responsive, mobile-first web designs.
design.item2: Tailwind CSS: Utilizing utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs.

tools.title: Tools & Technologies
tools.item1: Version Control: Proficient with Git and GitHub for source code management and collaboration.
tools.item2: Build Tools: Experience with Webpack, Babel, and npm/yarn for efficient project management.
tools.item3: Testing: Writing and executing tests using frameworks like Jest and Cypress to ensure code quality.

additional.title: Additional Skills
additional.item1: Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to tackle complex challenges effectively.

ibb-admin.subTitle: My Project In PT. Sarana Pactindo
ibb-admin.summary: As a Front-end Developer, I participated in the development of the admin application for Bank Mandiri Taspen KALSEL Ibb Admin. Collaborating with two other team members, I was responsible for implementing various features as instructed through the API documentation.
ibb-admin.desc: IBB Admin is a web-based admin application used by Bank Mandiri Taspen KALSEL to manage various internal company activities. The application is designed to improve operational efficiency, assist in decision-making, and simplify data management within the organization.
ibb-admin.desc1: IBB Admin is a web-based admin application used by Bank Mandiri Taspen KALSEL to manage various internal company activities.

features.item1: Implemented a login feature with support for translations (Indonesian and English).
features.item2: Built an interactive dashboard with data visualization for companies.
features.item3: Implemented CRUD features for the company list, enabling efficient company data management.
features.item4: Applied a holiday reception feature for all employees.
features.item5: Implemented CRUD features for banner images in the carousel on another webpage, providing flexibility in managing promotional content.

ibb-admin.alert: This project is not for public use. It is only for internal use.

ibb-va.subTitle: My Project In PT. Sarana Pactindo
ibb-va.summary: As a Front-end Developer, I participated in the development of the virtual account application for Bank Mandiri Taspen KALSEL. This application was designed to help manage transactions and company data more efficiently.
ibb-va.desc: Mandiri Virtual Account is a web-based application developed for Bank Mandiri Taspen KALSEL, designed to facilitate virtual account management.

features.item1: Implemented the login feature and page with a forgot password function.
features.item2: Built an interactive dashboard with effective chart visualizations, helping users quickly analyze data.
features.item3: Developed a transaction filter feature, allowing users to search and filter data easily.
features.item4: Integrated DANA income report data into an interactive table.
features.item5: Provided export and download functionality in EXCEL and PDF formats, enabling users to process and store reports with ease.

ibb-va.alert: This project is not for public use. It is only for internal use.

outputs.item1: Successfully implemented all assigned APIs, ensuring smooth integration between the backend and frontend.
outputs.item2: Developed a responsive and clean UI, providing an optimal user experience across various devices.
outputs.item3: Fostered effective and positive team collaboration, enabling the project to be completed on time with satisfying results.
